strong.span: Welcome To The North Spencer School Corporation Website!

br.span:
In a geographical area that boasts a rich history and beautiful scenery, the North Spencer County School Corporation proudly represents all who have gone before us. Along with a regard for the past comes an almost instinctive burning to blaze the future for those yet to come.
Click Here to Read More

div.h3: Worthy is the Child Reading Project

div.p:
Click Worthy is the Child Reading Project to read Superintendent, Mr. Dan Scherry's, message on this unique project through North Spencer County Schools. New readings will be posted weekly so check back periodically to hear these short stories from Worthy is the Child, by Richard Polzin. Happy reading and listening
Click Here to Read More

p.span: For the most recent update on North Spencer County School Corporation's schedule due to COVID-19, please click and read the attached newsletter from Superintendent, Mr. Dan Scherry. April 9

br.br: To access North Spencer's COVID-19 Continuous Learning Plan click here.
